name: Cute Girl Run - Beauty, adventure
description:
Cute Girl Run - Beauty, adventure.
Do not slow down.
Do not fall off.
Do not give up.

Run, the hit game is totally FREE!

FEATURES 
* Run with a cute girl. Control her running
* Find five different scenes and gain access to their unique talents!
* Watch out for breakable tiles! (Or don't. Repairing them is someone else's job.)
* Run and jump through a beautiful world. Good luck finding an unbroken path home!
* See how far you can get and climb the leaderboards! It's not like you can get any more lost after Explore Mode...
* Rock out to a cool stellar soundtrack!
